item.title: Running plan during pandemic, 2020
item.description: Running Running has been a part of my life since my bachelor’s and I have found one way or other to keep at it. During the 2020 lockdown it was difficult to run outside and I didn’t like running with my mask on. I thought of buying a treadmill to keep myself active. So far I have made a schedule and have stuck with it for sometime now. I thought it would be a good thing to share with everyone who might find it informational / motivational.

item.title: Programmers best friend IDE
item.description: A programmer needs a good IDE A good IDE is a programmers best friend. Writing clean code requires one to spend time in their code base and to have a look and feel of various parts of code. Search files, syntax highlighting, completions, renaming, formatting with fmt flavored styles etc are few of the many things that programmers rely on to write clean code. Its of paramount importance that one knows their own IDE same as they would know about the car they drive.
